hero.title: Be the next
hero.subtitle: restaurant they love
hero.description: Build your restaurant's online presence, accept orders, and grow your business with our all-in-one platform.
hero.noCreditCard: No credit card required â€¢ Set up in minutes

features.title: Everything you need to run your restaurant online
features.subtitle: One platform to manage your menu, orders, customers, and more

beautifulWebsite.title: Beautiful Website
beautifulWebsite.description: Create a stunning, mobile-responsive website for your restaurant in minutes. Customize colors, upload photos, and showcase your menu.

onlineOrdering.title: Online Ordering
onlineOrdering.description: Accept orders online 24/7. Customers can browse your menu, add items to cart, and place orders for pickup.

orderManagement.title: Order Management
orderManagement.description: Real-time order notifications, status updates, and order history. Manage everything from one dashboard.

qrCodeMenu.title: QR Code Menu
qrCodeMenu.description: Generate QR codes for your restaurant. Customers scan to view your menu and place orders instantly.

customerManagement.title: Customer Management
customerManagement.description: Build your customer base. Track orders, send notifications, and keep customers coming back.

secureReliable.title: Secure & Reliable
secureReliable.description: Your data is safe with us. We use industry-standard security and 99.9% uptime guarantee.

howItWorks.title: Get started in 3 simple steps
howItWorks.subtitle: From application to accepting orders in no time

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.description: Sign up in seconds with your restaurant details. No approval needed - start building immediately!

step2.title: Build Your Website
step2.description: Customize your restaurant website. Add your menu, upload photos, set your branding, and configure your settings.

step3.title: Start Accepting Orders
step3.description: Go live and start accepting orders! Share your QR code and website link with customers.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free, grow as you need

registration.title: Start Your Restaurant Online
registration.subtitle: Create your account and start building your restaurant website in minutes
registration.emailHint: This will be your login email
registration.terms: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. You can start building your website immediately after registration.

footer.tagline: The all-in-one platform for restaurants to build their online presence and grow their business.

website.cartEmptyHint: Add items from the menu to get started
website.visitLocations: Visit us at one of our convenient locations
website.deliciousSelectionDesc: Carefully crafted dishes made with the finest ingredients
website.getInTouchDesc: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out anytime!
website.newsletterDesc: Join our newsletter to receive the latest offers and exclusive discounts
website.thankYouSubscribing: Thank you for subscribing! We'll send updates to
website.downloadAppDesc: Order faster, earn rewards, and get exclusive deals

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.subtitle: Complete your order
checkout.paymentNote: Payment will be collected when you pick up your order
checkout.paymentNoteDefault: Payment will be collected when you receive your order
checkout.paymentNoteSingle: Payment will be collected via {method} when you pick up your order
checkout.paymentNoteSingleDelivery: Payment will be collected via {method} when you receive your delivery
checkout.paymentNoteMultiple: Payment will be collected via {methods} when you pick up your order
checkout.paymentNoteMultipleDelivery: Payment will be collected via {methods} when you receive your delivery
checkout.stripeNotReady: Payment system is not ready. Please try again.
checkout.stripeNotConfigured: Stripe payment is not configured. Please contact the restaurant or use a different payment method.
checkout.invalidAmount: Invalid payment amount. Please check your order.
checkout.paymentIntentFailed: Failed to initialize payment. Please try again.
checkout.paymentElementNotFound: Payment form could not be loaded. Please refresh the page.
checkout.stripeInitializationFailed: Failed to initialize payment system. Please try again or use a different payment method.
checkout.emailHint: We'll send order updates to this email
checkout.deliveryAddressPlaceholder: 123 Main St, City, State ZIP (if delivery is available)
checkout.deliveryAddressRequired: Delivery address is required for delivery orders
checkout.orderTypeNotEnabled: This order type is not enabled for this restaurant
checkout.specialInstructionsPlaceholder: Any special requests, dietary restrictions, or notes for the kitchen...
checkout.couponValidationFailed: Failed to validate coupon. Please try again.

orderConfirmation.title: Order Confirmed!
orderConfirmation.registerDescription: Create an account to receive real-time order status notifications and keep track of your order history!
orderConfirmation.emailHint: We'll send order updates to this email if provided
orderConfirmation.welcomeBackMessage: We're so happy to see you again! Your order has been linked to your account.
orderConfirmation.welcomeBackHint: You can now track this order and view your order history anytime.
orderConfirmation.registrationSuccessMessage: You'll receive email notifications about your order status. You can also view your order history anytime.
orderConfirmation.nextSteps: We'll prepare your order and notify you when it's ready for pickup. Payment will be collected when you arrive.
orderConfirmation.nextStepsPickup: We'll prepare your order and notify you when it's ready for pickup.
orderConfirmation.nextStepsDelivery: We'll prepare your order and notify you when it's ready for delivery.
orderConfirmation.paymentNoteDefault: Payment will be collected when you receive your order.
orderConfirmation.paymentNoteSingle: Payment will be collected via {method} when you pick up your order.
orderConfirmation.paymentNoteSingleDelivery: Payment will be collected via {method} when you receive your delivery.
orderConfirmation.paymentNoteMultiple: Payment will be collected via {methods} when you pick up your order.
orderConfirmation.paymentNoteMultipleDelivery: Payment will be collected via {methods} when you receive your delivery.
orderConfirmation.orderNotLoaded: Order information not loaded. Please refresh the page.
orderConfirmation.registrationFailed: Failed to register. Please try again.

orderTracking.statusReadyDesc: Your order is ready! Come pick it up
orderTracking.orderNotBelong: This order does not belong to this restaurant
orderTracking.orderNotFound: Order not found. Please check your order number and try again.

restaurantDashboard.title: Restaurant Dashboard
restaurantDashboard.subtitle: Manage your restaurant website and orders
restaurantDashboard.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
restaurantDashboard.emailNotificationsDesc: Receive email notifications when new orders are placed
restaurantDashboard.smsNotificationsDesc: Receive SMS notifications when new orders are placed
restaurantDashboard.pushNotificationsDesc: Receive push notifications when new orders are placed
restaurantDashboard.whatsappNotificationsDesc: Receive WhatsApp notifications when new orders are placed
restaurantDashboard.notificationEmailHint: If not specified, restaurant email will be used
restaurantDashboard.defaultLanguageHint: The default language that will be shown to customers when they first visit your website
restaurantDashboard.englishDescription: Enable English language for your website
restaurantDashboard.arabicDescription: Enable Arabic language for your website (RTL support included)
restaurantDashboard.atLeastOneLanguageRequired: At least one language must be enabled
restaurantDashboard.defaultLanguageMustBeEnabled: The default language must be enabled
restaurantDashboard.currencyCodeHint: Select the currency code for your restaurant
restaurantDashboard.previewHint: This is how prices will be displayed on your website
restaurantDashboard.dineInDescription: Allow customers to order for dine-in service
restaurantDashboard.pickupDescription: Allow customers to order for pickup
restaurantDashboard.deliveryDescription: Allow customers to order for delivery
restaurantDashboard.deliveryNote: Delivery is done by the Restaurant
restaurantDashboard.deliveryFeeHint: Flat rate fee charged for delivery orders
restaurantDashboard.deliveryTimeHint: Estimated delivery time range, e.g. 15â€“25 minutes
restaurantDashboard.requestPending: Request pending. Wait for the delivery company to approve.
restaurantDashboard.requestRejectedHint: Your request was rejected. You can send a new request to the same or another company.
restaurantDashboard.confirmRemoveDeliveryCompany: Are you sure you want to remove this delivery company? You can select a different one after removing.
restaurantDashboard.deliveryCompanyRemoved: Delivery company removed successfully. You can now select a different one.

restaurantDashboard.businessHoursSubtitle: Set opening and closing times for each day
restaurantDashboard.offersSubtitle: Manage promotions customers can see: free delivery, % off, minimum order value.

restaurantDashboard.cashOnPickupDescription: Allow customers to pay with cash when picking up their order
restaurantDashboard.cashOnDeliveryDescription: Allow customers to pay with cash when receiving delivery
restaurantDashboard.creditCardDescription: Accept credit and debit card payments at the restaurant
restaurantDashboard.onlinePaymentDescription: Accept online payments via Stripe, PayPal, or other payment gateways
restaurantDashboard.mobilePaymentDescription: Accept mobile payments like Apple Pay, Google Pay
